rules: Rule1: If the researcher has funding from the grant, then the researcher receives the award of the prize.
Rule2: Should the lab receive ethics approval from the committee, the lab obtains clearance from biosafety.
Rule3: Given that the experiment passes the review by the committee, then if the researcher completes the study involving the experiment, the researcher publishes a paper in the journal.
Rule4: Either the researcher uses an alternative method involving the technique, or if the lab receives ethics approval from the committee, then the experiment passes the review by the committee.
Rule5: On the condition that the lab receives clearance from biosafety, the experiment meets the standards of the protocol.
Rule6: Provided that the experiment meets the standards of the protocol, then if the researcher completes the study involving the experiment, the researcher publishes a paper in the journal.

Rule7: If it is not the case that when the lab receives ethics approval from the committee, then if the researcher completes the study involving the experiment, the researcher publishes a paper in the journal, then the researcher terminates the project related to the experiment.
Rule8: Whenever the researcher lacks funding from the grant, the researcher completes the study involving the experiment.
facts: Fact1: The lab received ethics approval from the committee.
Fact2: It is not the case that the researcher published a paper in the journal.
Fact3: The researcher did not terminate the project related to the experiment.
Fact4: The researcher did not use an alternative method involving the technique.

question: The researcher received the award of the prize.
